name: 田方治
objective:
本課程之主要目的除介紹基本之類神經理論外，更在於運用現有之類神經網路於工業工程領域內之相關運用，將以現有之資料庫實地解決分類、分群、預測、監控等實際問題，使學生能夠了解類神經網路之基礎理論外，更可深入運用此工具。
The objective of this class is to explore the basic theoretical basis and applications of Neural Networks and their applications.  In this course, students will learn how to build deep learning networks and their applications in machine vision areas 

加強程式、邏輯訓練及實作 (PyTorch & python & MVA – prerequisites)

The major topics of networks covered include: 
AD (Anomaly Detection): CS-Flow、PatchCore、Padim
Classifier: CNN (ResNet, DenseNet, EfficientNetv2)
OD (Object Detection): FRCNN、YOLO、Mask RCNN
Semantic Segmentation: AutoEncoder, UNet
GAN: DCGAN etc.
schedule:
The content of this course include the following subjects：
1. PyTorch:  (3 weeks)
a. Basic commands & nn.module related commands
b. Gradient descent & BPN
c. CNN & LeNet
d. Dataset & Dataloader
e. Loss Function & Transformation
2. CNN Training Tips & CAM Heatmaps, Visualization (2 week)
3. Classifier: ResNet, DenseNet, EfficientNet (2 weeks)
4. OD (Object Detection): FRCNN, Yolo, Mask RCNN, Labeling (2 weeks)
5. AD (Anomaly Detection): PaDim, CS-Flow, PatchCore (2 weeks)
6. Semantic Segmentation: AE, Unet (2 Weeks)
7. GAN: DCGAN, etc. (2 Weeks)
